message: Palestinian channels: These are coins that were in the pocket of a Gazan who went to buy food for his family in Abasan (east of Khan Yunis) and was killed in an attack.

Civil Defense in Gaza:
Ten thousand "martyrs" are under the ruins of the buildings in the Gaza Strip.
No trace remains of 1760 bodies of martyrs due to Israel's use of prohibited weapons according to the international convention.
2210 bodies disappeared from the graves in Gaza.
The residents of the Gaza Strip are forced to make do with 11% of the territory of the Gaza Strip due to the encirclement of the occupation army.
The location of the tanks, near the water tower, in the picture above 👆 is marked with a blue circle here on the map.

Follower A adds:

These are water towers that Israel built while we were in Gush Katif, near the main road of Gush Katif, just before the square that led to the settlements of Katif and Netzer Hazani.

Additional Palestinian sources indicate that the tanks in the photo 👆 are on a dominating hill located about 300 meters west of the Hamad neighborhood (al-Khauz area - the water tower - and al-Jamil area) and they are covering for the other forces operating in the area.
Unofficial Lebanese sources: one killed in the motorcycle attack in the Sheba area in southern Lebanon.

The Palestinians report 22 deaths in the morning hours in four attacks in the Strip:

4 dead and 6 wounded in the attack on the home of the Misbah family in Abasan in the east of Khan Yunis.

7 killed in the attack on the house of the Hossein al-Attar family on al-Mazara Street in Deir Al-Balah in the center of the Gaza Strip.

4 dead and 19 injured in an attack on a house on al Huja Street in the Jabaliya refugee camp in the northern Gaza Strip.

7 killed in the attack on the house of the el Yazji family on el-Ashrin Street in the Nizirat refugee camp in the center of the Gaza Strip.
Lebanese sources: An Israeli UAV attacked a motorcycle a short time ago in the area of ​​the village of Sheba in southern Lebanon. The motorcyclist was injured.
Palestinian documentation of tanks that are already west of the Hamad neighborhood in Khan Yunis.

The advance of IDF maneuvering forces in Khan Yunis

The Palestinians report the movement of IDF tanks and vehicles west towards the Hamad neighborhood in northern Khan Yunis (marked with a red circle).
Following the advance of the forces, Gazans staying in the Azada Park area (marked with a red pin) began to quickly evacuate the area (even though the IDF did not require them to evacuate).

Last night the IDF spokesman announced the fall of a soldier from the Logistics Corps in a battle in the center of the Gaza Strip.

May his memory be a blessing.
Bloggers involved in tracking vessel movements claim: within a few days, close to a third of the US naval force will be in the Middle East region.

Senior Hamas official Osama Hamdan on the ceasefire negotiations:

What the Americans are proposing does not include a withdrawal from the Strip or a ceasefire.

Until now we are only negotiating the criteria and not yet the list of prisoners to be released.

The ceasefire must be guaranteed within the framework of clear criteria.

##
It is interesting to see that he admits that Hamas is still negotiating, even though it has publicly stated that it is not...

Palestinian channels report that the IDF forces operating in the early morning in the Balata refugee camp in Nablus removed the fabric awnings installed above the market alleys (to hide terrorists' movement from the eyes of the IDF drones), then set them on fire.

The elimination last night in Jenin

The military wing of Hamas confirms that two of its senior officers were killed last night in the drone attack in Jenin:

Rafet Dawasi
Ahmed Abu Ara

According to an official announcement published by the branch, the two are responsible for the planning and execution of a number of recent attacks, the three most prominent of which were:

1. The bomb attack in Jenin on June 27 in which Captain Alon Sakagio fell and another 16 soldiers were injured.

2. Ambush close to the perimeter fence in the village of Matla (Jenin) on July 23.

3. The attack at Mehola Junction in the Jordan Valley in which Jonathan Deutsch was murdered and another civilian was injured on August 11.

##
As you can see in the photos, contrary to custom, a funeral will be held for the two terrorists with their faces covered, after their bodies were charred...

The form of elimination and the charred state of their bodies contribute to the strengthening of Israeli deterrence in the West Bank.

Joint IDF and ISA announcement:

The ISA and IDF eliminated two senior Hamas terrorists in Jenin who were involved in planning the shooting attack in the Jordan Valley, during which Yonatan Deutsch was murdered

In a joint IDF and ISA operation, an aircraft struck a vehicle in Jenin and eliminated two senior Hamas terrorists.
 
The terrorist Ahmed Abu Ara from Aqabah was involved in further terrorist attacks and was a senior operative in the production of explosives for terror attacks.
Additionally, the terrorist Rafet Dawasi from Silat al-Harithiya was a senior in the Hamas military infrastructure of the Jenin area. 

During the ISA investigation on Yassin Ghanem, who was arrested by the ISA and IDF, it was revealed that the two terrorists were involved in the terror attack on the 11th of August 2024 in the Jordan Valley, during which Yonatan Deutsch was murdered.

##
It is interesting to see that the name of who "snitched" - Ghanem - was published. Perhaps there are other intentions in this disclosure.
The moment of the attack on the terrorists' vehicle last night in Jenin by an Israeli aircraft.
The exchange of fire between the operatives of the security apparatus of the Palestinian Authority and between armed men near the hospital in Jenin last night.
Gaza sources: One of the bombs dropped yesterday on the towers in the Hamad neighborhood in Khan Yunis did not explode.

Palestinian sources reported that four people were killed in an attack by an Israeli aircraft on a vehicle in al-Tiqeh square in Jenin around 9PM last night.
According to these sources, the bodies of the four were charred as a result of the fire that broke out in the vehicle.

The IDF spokesman confirmed that an Israeli aircraft attacked a terrorist cell in Jenin.

Palestinian sources reported that an exchange of fire occurred following the attack between the PA's security forces and armed men in Jenin over a claim that the PA's security forces took the weapons of the terrorists who were killed in the vehicle that was attacked in Jenin.
